RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.label: Internal Comfort
RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.description: These quirks determine how comfortable a pawn is to be inside of.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Heavenly
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label]'s prey are formaly warned - once you're in, you'll never want to leave.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Pillowy
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label]'s innards let you sink in, then hold you snug. It's not uncommon for [PAWN_possessive] prey to blink and have hours pass.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Cozy
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label]'s innards might churn and grind, but it's soothing and relaxing. They'd make for a good predatory massuess.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Snug
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label]'s innards won't give much give, but it's not too hard to find a nice spot.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Rough
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label]'s insides like to clench in a little too much, making it hard to get comfortable inside [PAWN_objective].

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Abrasive
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label]'s insides are too rough and tumble to relax and get snug inside of. The only real comfort you can expect as [PAWN_possessive] prey is the aftercare.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Tenderizing
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label]'s innards have the rough comfort of a used concrete mixer with cinder block bedding. [PAWN_possessive] prey are recomended to bring anesthesia if they want to sleep.
